scripts.discovery: bun run build:discovery && frida -U -l android/build/discovery.js -f com.habby.archero
scripts.build:12020: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port12020_lite.js android/patchers/port12020_lite.ts
scripts.patcher:12020: bun run build:12020 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port12020_lite.js
scripts.patcher:12020:log: bun run build:12020 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port12020_lite.js 2>&1 | tee logs/patcher_12020_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
scripts.build:443: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port443_redirect.js android/patchers/port443_redirect.ts
scripts.patcher:443: bun run build:443 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port443_redirect.js
scripts.patcher:443:log: bun run build:443 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port443_redirect.js 2>&1 | tee logs/patcher_443_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
scripts.build:auth-discovery: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/auth_flow_discovery.js android/loggers/auth_flow_discovery.ts
scripts.auth-discovery: bun run build:auth-discovery && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/auth_flow_discovery.js
scripts.auth-discovery:log: bun run build:auth-discovery && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/auth_flow_discovery.js 2>&1 | tee logs/sessions/auth_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
